feed.title: Heavy Hitters
feed.subtitle: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of NFL and college football, baseball, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!

entry.title: NHL Playoffs First Round Recap and Second Round Predictions - Season 3 Episode 31

link.title: NHL Playoffs First Round Recap and Second Round Predictions - Season 3 Episode 31

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean talks about the NHL playoffs and a recap of what happened in the first round of the playoffs along with his second round predictions.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media
entry.summary: This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean talks about the NHL playoffs and a recap of what happened in the first round of the playoffs along with his second round predictions.

entry.title: NBA Playoffs Talk and NFL Draft Recap and Reactions - Season 3 Episode 30

link.title: NBA Playoffs Talk and NFL Draft Recap and Reactions - Season 3 Episode 30

entry.content:
For the first time ever, High Tops Media podcasts, Heavy Hitters and One on One, do a crossover episode as Dean Gutic from Heavy Hitters and Jack Acello from the One on One podcast, along with special guest Lucas Jafet, talk about the NBA playoffs and what has happened so far along with a recap of the NFL draft and their reactions to some of the picks that were made, especially from their teams.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: MLB First Month Takeaways, 2024 NFL Mock Draft, and the Big News Out of Cincinnati - Season 3 Episode 29

link.title: MLB First Month Takeaways, 2024 NFL Mock Draft, and the Big News Out of Cincinnati - Season 3 Episode 29

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his take away so far from the first month of the MLB season, along with his mock draft for the 2024 NFL draft, and his reaction to the big news out of Cincinnati regarding the Bengals, which took place while the episode was being recorded.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Max Holloway and Alex Pereira, NHL Regular Season Recap, NHL Playoff Predictions, NHL Award Predictions and the Coyotes Move From Arizona to Salt Lake City - Season 3 Episode 28

link.title: Max Holloway and Alex Pereira, NHL Regular Season Recap, NHL Playoff Predictions, NHL Award Predictions and the Coyotes Move From Arizona to Salt Lake City - Season 3 Episode 28

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his reaction to the victories of Alex Pereira and Max Holloway from UFC 300 last weekend. After that, Dean gives us a recap of the NHL regular season along with his playoff and award predictions. Finally, Dean gives us his thoughts on the Coyotes moving from Arizona to Salt Lake City after the franchise played their last game on Wednesday night against the Edmonton Oilers.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: UFC 300 Predictions, WWE Wrestlemania 40 Recap, and the Pitching Problem in Baseball - Season 3 Episode 27

link.title: UFC 300 Predictions, WWE Wrestlemania 40 Recap, and the Pitching Problem in Baseball - Season 3 Episode 27

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for UFC 300 this Saturday for the entire main card of the pay-per-view along with a recap of wrestlemania 40 in the WWE as a bonus segment. To finally close out the episode, Dean talks about the big pitching problem in baseball and why this problem could be an issue for a long time, especially for pitchers.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

entry.title: Diggs Traded From Buffalo to Houston, Athletics Move to Sacramento, and Reviewing the NHL Playoffs Wild Card Race - Season 3 Episode 26

link.title: Diggs Traded From Buffalo to Houston, Athletics Move to Sacramento, and Reviewing the NHL Playoffs Wild Card Race - Season 3 Episode 26

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his reaction to Buffalo Bills star WR Stefon Diggs being traded to the Houston Texans and what it means for the Buffalo Bills going forward, especially for the draft in late April. After that, Dean gives us his reaction to the athletics moving from Oakland to Sacramento before they move to Las Vegas in the near future after the team announced on Thursday that this would be the last season they would play in Oakland. To close out the episode, Dean gives us a review thus far of the wild card race in the eastern and western conference in the NHL with the season coming to a near end.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: NFL Going Backwards With New Rule Changes and MLB Award Predictions - Season 3 Episode 25

link.title: NFL Going Backwards With New Rule Changes and MLB Award Predictions - Season 3 Episode 25

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his MLB award predictions for the 2024 season, wrapping up his weekly series of predictions in the MLB. After that, Dean gives us his reaction and a rant with news about the NFL making new changes for the upcoming season.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: MLB AL West, Central, and East Predictions, Blake Snell to the Giants Reaction, Jets Bolster Offense With New Pickups and Reacting to Jackson Holliday Not Making the Orioles Opening Day Roster - Season 3 Episode 24

link.title: MLB AL West, Central, and East Predictions, Blake Snell to the Giants Reaction, Jets Bolster Offense With New Pickups and Reacting to Jackson Holliday Not Making the Orioles Opening Day Roster - Season 3 Episode 24

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for the AL West, AL Central, and AL East in the MLB for the upcoming 2024 season along with his reaction to NL Cy Young winner, Blake Snell, joining the San Francisco Giants on a two year deal. After that, Dean gives his reaction to the New York Jets, bolstering their offense, with two new big pickups in the offseason. Finally, Dean ends the episode by going on a rant as to why the Baltimore Orioles made the wrong call by not selecting Jackson Holliday to be on the team’s opening day roster.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

Finally, Dean ends the episode by going on a rant as to why the Baltimore Orioles made the wrong call by not selecting Jackson Holliday to be on the team’s opening day roster.

entry.title: MLB NL East Predictions, UFC 299 Recap, Aaron Donald Retires From the NFL, Winners and Losers From the First Wave of NFL Free Agency - Season 3 Episode 23

link.title: MLB NL East Predictions, UFC 299 Recap, Aaron Donald Retires From the NFL, Winners and Losers From the First Wave of NFL Free Agency - Season 3 Episode 23

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for the NL East in the MLB along with his reaction to White Sox starting pitcher Dylan cease getting traded to the San Diego Padres and an update on Yankees ace Gerrit Cole’s injury. After that, Dean gives us a recap of what happened last week at UFC 299 along with some big news that happened earlier in the day on Friday regarding rams, defensive tackle, Aaron Donald retiring from the NFL. Then Dean gives us his winners and losers so far after the first wave, a free agency in the NFL. Finally, Dean closes out the show by giving us his reaction in a bonus segment to the Wagner College Seahawks out of Staten Island, NY, making the NCAA men’s basketball tournament for the first time since 2003.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: MLB NL Central Predictions, NHL Trade Deadline Day Recap/Winners and Losers and UFC 299 Picks - Season 3 Episode 22

link.title: MLB NL Central Predictions, NHL Trade Deadline Day Recap/Winners and Losers and UFC 299 Picks - Season 3 Episode 22

entry.content:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us his predictions for the NL Central division in the MLB along with his recap of the NHL trade deadline, featuring the big winners, and losers. Finally, Dean closes out the episode by giving us his picks for UFC 299.
